alert.note: Alert for Eau Claire (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 02 at 8:04PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Eau Claire County through 845 PM CDT... At 804 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Eau Claire, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Eau Claire around 810 PM CDT. Altoona around 815 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Fall Creek. This includes the following highways... Interstate 94 in Wisconsin between mile markers 57 and 83. U.S. Highway 53 between mile markers 86 and 92. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
